name: MyAirways
0:
”Alexa, open my airways”
”Alexa, start my airways”
”Alexa, launch my airways”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my airways
des:
This is a demo skill for Airline companies or Travel Agencies. This skill can be used as an additional channel for answering sales, as well as support related queries. Since, no human intervention is required, the answer that the users get is instantaneous, hence resulting in enhanced and quick customer support.

Instructions: 
Invoke the skill by saying: Alexa, Open My Airways.

You may ask any of the questions below;

1. What are your latest offers?

2. Tell me about your aircrafts

3. I want to check in

4. Where do you fly?

5. How can I check in online?

6. What is required to enter the airport?

7. Which documents are accepted?

8. Can I be denied boarding?

9. How can I pay for a reservation?

10. How can I get refund?

11. What onboard services do you offer?

12. Do you serve food onboard?

13. Can I bring my own food onboard?

14. What is Family Fare?

15. Tell me about your policy for family fare?

16. Would you contact me if my flight is delayed?

17. What is your flight cancellation policy?

18. What is overbooking?

19. Can I book and select a seat in advance?

20. Can I book a flight in advance?

21. Can I book and hold my reservation?

22. How do I book online?

23. Can I change my seat?

24. Do you have wifi onboard?

25. What is Priority check in?

26. Tell me my boarding details

=======================
This is a demo voice app developed by Digitall DNA.

For development or integration related queries, please contact us via our website www.thedigitaldna.net or email us on hello@thedigitaldna.net
